static.updateSampleStatus: UPDATE samples set status = ? where sample_id = ?
static.updateSamplePriority: UPDATE samples set priority = ? where sample_id = ?
static.idExist: SELECT sample_id from samples where sample_id = ?
static.spectraIdExist: SELECT spectra_id from spectra where spectra_id = ?
static.binIdExist: SELECT bin_id from bin where bin_id = ?
static.resultLinkIdExist: SELECT id from result_link where id = ?

UpdateBinBase.update: update samples set machine = ?, operator = ?, run_id = ?,setupx_id = ? where sample_id = ?
UpdateBinBase.visibleSample: Select sample_name,sample_id,setupx_id from samples where visible = 'TRUE' order by sample_id DESC
UpdateBinBase.allSamples: Select sample_name,sample_id,setupx_id from samples order by sample_id DESC
UpdateBinBase.selectClassKey: select key_id from META_KEY where key = ?
UpdateBinBase.selectSampleIdsBySampleName: SELECT sample_id FROM samples where sample_name = ?

SQLResultCreator.checkForResult: SELECT result_id from result where name = ?
SQLResultCreator.checkForSamples: SELECT sample_id,class from samples where sample_name = ? and visible = 'TRUE' and finished = 'TRUE'

RuntimeStatisticCollector.update: update runtime set start = ?, "end" = ? where sample_id = ? and operation = ? and "group" = ? and type = ?
RuntimeStatisticCollector.select: SELECT * from runtime where sample_id = ? and operation = ? and "group" = ? and type = ?

QualityClassGenerator.pattern: SELECT pattern from type where id = ?
QualityClassGenerator.sampleNames: select name from rawdata where name ~* ? and name ~* ?

DatabaseImportHandler.sample3: UPDATE samples set visible = 'FALSE' where sample_name = ? and sample_id != ?
DatabaseImportHandler.version: SELECT version FROM SAMPLES WHERE sample_name = ? order by version
DatabaseImportHandler.configuration: SELECT configuration_id FROM CONFIGURATION WHERE configuration_id = ?

SingleThreadClassImporter.bin: SELECT a.bin_id FROM samples b, bin a where a.sample_id = b.sample_id and b.finished = 'FALSE' and b.class = ?
SingleThreadClassImporter.deleteSpectra: UPDATE SPECTRA set bin_id = null WHERE bin_id = ?
SingleThreadClassImporter.sample: UPDATE samples set finished = 'TRUE' where sample_id = ?

SimpleMatching.libraryStatement: select * from BIN a where a.bin_id not in ( SELECT bin_id from SPECTRA where sample_id = ? and bin_id is not null) ORDER BY retention_index ASC
SimpleMatching.unknownStatement: SELECT spectra_id,retention_index,uniquemass,purity,apex_sn,sample_id,uniquemass,apex,spectra,retention_time,leco FROM SPECTRA WHERE sample_id = ? AND bin_id is null ORDER BY apex_sn DESC

RecrusiveCorrection.libraryStatement: select a.* ,b.* from BIN a, STANDARD b where a.bin_id = b.bin_id ORDER BY a.retention_index DESC
RecrusiveCorrection.libraryAllStatement: select a.*, b.* from BIN a, STANDARD b WHERE a.bin_id = b.bin_id ORDER BY a.retention_index ASC
RecrusiveCorrection.unknownStatement: SELECT spectra_id,retention_time AS retention_index,uniquemass,purity,apex_sn,sample_id,uniquemass,apex,spectra,leco FROM SPECTRA WHERE sample_id = ? ORDER BY retention_index DESC

DatabaseResultHandler.newBinStatementAnalysis: UPDATE SPECTRA set bin_id = ?,match = 1000 ,new_bin = 'TRUE' where spectra_id = ?
DatabaseResultHandler.assignBinStatement: UPDATE SPECTRA set bin_id = ? , match = ? ,found_at_correction = ? WHERE spectra_id = ?
DatabaseResultHandler.assignBinStatementUpdateApex: UPDATE SPECTRA set apex = ? where spectra_id = ?
DatabaseResultHandler.binStatement: SELECT retention_index FROM BIN where bin_id = ?
DatabaseResultHandler.getBinApex: SELECT apex,spectra FROM BIN WHERE bin_id = ?
DatabaseResultHandler.updateBinApex: UPDATE BIN SET apex = ? WHERE bin_id = ?
DatabaseResultHandler.updateBinSpec: UPDATE BIN SET spectra = ?, apex_sn = ?, signal_noise = ?, purity = ? WHERE bin_id = ?

ProblematicResultHandler.newBinStatementAnalysis: UPDATE SPECTRA set bin_id = currval('bin_id'),match = 1000 ,new_bin = 'TRUE' where spectra_id = ?
ProblematicResultHandler.assignBinStatement: UPDATE SPECTRA set bin_id = ? , match = ? ,found_at_correction = ?,problematic = 'TRUE' WHERE spectra_id = ?
ProblematicResultHandler.assignBinStatementUpdateApex: UPDATE SPECTRA set apex = ? where spectra_id = ?
ProblematicResultHandler.binStatement: SELECT retention_index FROM BIN where bin_id = ?
ProblematicResultHandler.getBinApex: SELECT apex,spectra FROM BIN WHERE bin_id = ?
ProblematicResultHandler.updateBinApex: UPDATE BIN SET apex = ? WHERE bin_id = ?
ProblematicResultHandler.updateBinSpec: UPDATE BIN SET spectra = ?, apex_sn = ?, signal_noise = ?, purity = ? WHERE bin_id = ?

CorrectionMethod.update: UPDATE SPECTRA SET retention_index = ? WHERE spectra_id = ?
CorrectionMethod.select: SELECT retention_index,spectra_id FROM SPECTRA WHERE sample_id = ? ORDER BY retention_index
CorrectionMethod.correctionFailed: UPDATE SAMPLES set correction_failed = ?, "allowNewBin" = ? where sample_id = ?
CorrectionMethod.sample: select sample_name, sod, date,machine from samples where sample_id = ?
CorrectionMethod.sod: select sample_id, sample_name from samples where sod = ? and sample_name not similar to '%_bl[0-9]*_[0-9]%' and date_trunc('day',date::date) = date_trunc('day',?::date) and machine = ? and machine != '?' and visible = 'TRUE' and correction_failed = 'FALSE' order by sample_name
CorrectionMethod.sameDay: select sample_id, sample_name from samples where date_trunc('day',date::date) = date_trunc('day',?::date) and sample_name not similar to '%_bl[0-9]*_[0-9]%' and correction_failed = 'FALSE' and machine = ? and machine != '?' and visible = 'TRUE' order by sample_name
CorrectionMethod.lastDay: select sample_id, sample_name from samples where date_trunc('day',date::date) = date_trunc('day',?::date) and sample_name not similar to '%_bl[0-9]*_[0-9]%' and correction_failed = 'FALSE' and machine = ? and machine != '?' and visible = 'TRUE' order by sample_name
CorrectionMethod.reset:
update spectra set retention_index = retention_time, bin_id = null
where sample_id = ?

CalculateBinAvability.finished: SELECT sample_id FROM SAMPLES WHERE finished = 'TRUE' AND class = ? AND visible = 'TRUE'
CalculateBinAvability.notfinished: SELECT sample_id FROM SAMPLES WHERE finished = 'FALSE' AND class = ? AND visible = 'TRUE'
CalculateBinAvability.all: SELECT sample_id FROM SAMPLES WHERE class = ? AND visible = 'TRUE'
CalculateBinAvability.bin: SELECT bin_id FROM SPECTRA WHERE sample_id = ? AND bin_id = ? AND problematic = 'FALSE'

RemoveWrongBinThread.spectraAnalysis: UPDATE SPECTRA set bin_id = null WHERE bin_id = ?

ExportResult.sampleVersion: SELECT version,result FROM QUANTIFICATION WHERE sample_id = ?
ExportResult.sample: SELECT sample_id FROM RESULT_LINK WHERE result_id = ?
ExportResult.sampleCount: SELECT count(sample_id) FROM RESULT_LINK WHERE result_id = ?
ExportResult.bin: SELECT bin_id,name,quantmass,spectra,apex_sn , retention_index, group_id FROM BIN WHERE export = 'TRUE' ORDER BY bin_id ASC
ExportResult.virtualbin: SELECT bin_id,name FROM view_virtualbin WHERE export = 'TRUE'
ExportResult.virtualbinCount: SELECT count(bin_id) FROM view_virtualbin WHERE export = 'TRUE'
ExportResult.binCount: SELECT count(bin_id) FROM BIN WHERE export = 'TRUE'
ExportResult.fetchVersion: SELECT count(bin_id) FROM bin WHERE export = 'TRUE'
ExportResult.fetchRefrences: SELECT * FROM reference where bin_id = ? and class_id = ?
ExportResult.isStandard: SELECT a.bin_id from bin a, standard b where a.bin_id = b.bin_id and a.bin_id = ?

SampleExport.quant: SELECT * FROM spectra where sample_id = ? and bin_id = ?
SampleExport.sample: SELECT sample_name,class, setupx_id,correction_failed FROM SAMPLES WHERE sample_id = ?
SampleExport.bin: SELECT bin_id,name,quantmass FROM BIN WHERE export = 'TRUE' ORDER BY bin_id
SampleExport.virtualquant: SELECT SPECTRA.uniquemass,SPECTRA.signal_noise,SPECTRA.purity,SPECTRA.retention_index,SPECTRA.spectra_id,SPECTRA.retention_time,SPECTRA.spectra,SPECTRA.apex_sn, SPECTRA.match, SPECTRA.bin_id AS real_bin FROM SPECTRA,VIRTUAL_BIN WHERE SPECTRA.sample_id = ? AND SPECTRA.bin_id = VIRTUAL_BIN.parent_id AND VIRTUAL_BIN.bin_id = ?
SampleExport.virtualbin: SELECT bin_id,name,quantmass FROM view_virtualbin WHERE export = 'TRUE'
SampleExport.virtualProperty: SELECT * FROM VIRTUAL_BIN WHERE export = 'TRUE' AND parent_id = ?

SQLExportService.id: SELECT max(result_id) FROM result where setupx = ?

QuantificationTableDestination.update: UPDATE QUANTIFICATION set result = ?, version = ? where sample_id=?
QuantificationTableDestination.select: SELECT result FROM quantification where sample_id = ?
QuantificationTableDestination.version: SELECT count(bin_id) FROM bin WHERE export = 'TRUE'

QuantificationTableSource.select: SELECT result FROM quantification where sample_id = ?

ExportServer.id: select sample_id from SAMPLES a where a.setupx_id = ? and visible = 'TRUE'
